## Tile.addOwnedTexture() method

Add ownership of a texture to this tile. The texture will be disposed if the `Tile` is disposed.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
addOwnedTexture(texture: THREE.Texture): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  texture | THREE.Texture | Texture to be owned by the <code>Tile</code> |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
